Package nl.amalin.fontys.game

package nl.amalin.fontys.game
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Answer
    The Answer class represents an answer in the game, including its text and score.
    DataTableCreator
    The DataTableCreator class is responsible for creating the database tables and inserting initial data for the game.
    DbConnector
     
    Game
    The Game class represents the main game logic and user interface for the Society Quest Game.
    PlayerPanel
    The PlayerPanel class represents the panel displaying the player's character and score.
    Question
    The Question class represents a question in the game, including its text, number, and associated answers.
    SocietyQuest
    The SocietyQuest class represents the main game board for the Society Quest Game.
